description: Defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for User API, including CreateUserRequest and UserResponse, with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: UserDtos
classes.description: Container class for user-related DTOs, including CreateUserRequest and UserResponse.

classes.name: CreateUserRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new user, includes name and email fields with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: UserResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning user details, including id, name, and email.
